title: The Heart is highland
creator_credit: John Taylor, Edgar H. Anstey and British Transport Films
brief_description: Some aspects of the life of the people of the Scottish Highlands are shown, linking present developments in industry, agriculture and transport with the country’s dramatic past - well symbolised by the interior of Glamis Castle.
creator_credit_for_label: John Taylor, Edgar H. Anstey and British Transport Films
